name: MARCUS USERBOT
description: A USERBOT TO MANAGE YOUR TELEGRAM ACCOUNT

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_PIC.description: Enter Telegraph Link for Alive Pic.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Channel Where You Save Your Plugins

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter A User Id Which You Would Like to Use To Control Sudo. Don't Give Your Own ID Or ID Of Users You Don't Trust.

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: A Group ID Where You Want Logging Feature

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_ID.description: Just Copy Paste PRIVATE_GROUP_ID FOR AFK PLUGIN

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: SORRY COPY THE ABOVE GROUP'S ID

STRING_SESSION.description: Get From Repl.run Or Run Locally or https://replit.com/@hackelite011/MarcusUserbot#main.py

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for GitHub Commit Plugin. Google 'Github access token' to find more About It.

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Your repo name Example: hackelite01/Marcususerbot, but GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN must be setup first.

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the API token of your bot. GO Get it.

TG_BOT_NAME_OF_HER.description: You Telegram Bot's USERNAME Here. Needed For Help Module And Cbutton. REMEMBER TYPE USERNAME WITHOUT@

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: NEEDED FOR INLINE BUTTONS JUST COPY `TG_BOT_NAME_OF_HER` To Work Dont Include `@`

DOWNLOAD_PFP_URL_CLOCK.description: Needed for autopic module. A url that is a preview link of your Profile Pic

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic
